exportToFirefoxSyncSuccess.message: Settings exported to Firefox Sync successfully

importFromFirefoxSyncSuccess.message: Settings imported from Firefox Sync successfully

noSyncExportFound.message: No preferences found in Firefox Sync

confirmSyncOverwrite.message: There's already an export in Firefox Sync. Overwrite?

confirmSyncWipe.message: Wipe Firefox Sync export? This can't be undone.

optionsActionsNewTemporaryContainer.message: Reopen Tab in a new Temporary Container

optionsActionsNotAvailable.message: Actions are not available in this tab

optionsGeneralAutomaticModeTitle.message: Automatically open new tabs and websites in Temporary Containers when no container is assigned.

optionsGeneralContainerColorRandomExclud.message: Excluded Colors for Random Container Color

optionsGeneralContainerIconRandomExclude.message: Excluded Icons for Random Container Icon

optionsGeneralContainerRemoval15Minutes.message: 15 minutes after the last tab in it closes (default)

optionsGeneralContainerRemoval2Minutes.message: 2 minutes after the last tab in it closes

optionsGeneralContainerRemoval5Minutes.message: 5 minutes after the last tab in it closes

optionsGeneralContainerRemovalInstant.message: After the last tab in it closes

optionsGeneralToolbarPopup.message: Show popup when clicking the toolbar icon

optionsIsolationDomain.message: Isolate if target domain does not match exactly with current domain

optionsIsolationExcludeContainersDescrip.message: Disables isolation events for the selected containers.

optionsIsolationGlobalMouseDescription.message: Isolation rules for mouse click activities. When used with global or domain isolation enabled, any setting that enables isolation will be enforced.

optionsIsolationGlobalUrlNavigationDescr.message: Global isolation rule for all URL navigation in existing tabs, new tabs, address bar and mouse clicks.

optionsIsolationIgnoredDomainsDescriptio.message: Ignored domains will not be isolated.

optionsIsolationSubdomain.message: Isolate if target domain does not match current domain or subdomains

glossaryIsolationDescription.message: Isolation prevents websites from tracking you across different containers.

glossaryIsolationFeature1.message: Open websites in new temporary containers based on your isolation settings

glossaryIsolationFeature2.message: Prevent websites from sharing data between containers

errorFailedToLoadIsolationPerDomain.message: Failed to load Isolation: Per Domain settings

errorFailedToLoadIsolationGlobal.message: Failed to load Isolation: Global settings

errorFailedToLoadAdvancedMisc.message: Failed to load Advanced: Misc settings

errorFailedToLoadAdvancedCookies.message: Failed to load Advanced: Cookies settings

optionsIsolationPerDomainPatternDescript.message: Enter a domain pattern to configure isolation rules for specific domains.

optionsIsolationPerDomainDisableIfNavPer.message: Disable if navigating from a Permanent Container

optionsIsolationPerDomainDisableIfNavTem.message: Disable if navigating from a Temporary Container

optionsIsolationExcludeDomainsDescriptio.message: Domains that should not trigger isolation for this rule.

optionsIsolationPerDomainPatternExists.message: A rule for this domain pattern already exists

optionsAdvancedMiscAutomaticModeNewTab.message: When to create Temporary Containers for new tabs:

optionsAdvancedMiscAutomaticModeNewTabCr.message: On Tab Creation (default - best cookie protection)

optionsAdvancedMiscContextMenuLinks.message: Show Temporary Container entry in the right click on links context menu

optionsAdvancedMiscContextMenuBookmarks.message: Show Temporary Container entry in the right click on bookmarks context menu

optionsAdvancedMiscReplaceTabs.message: Instead of creating a new tab replace the current tab in case of Isolation

optionsAdvancedMiscCloseRedirectorTabs.message: Automatically close leftover redirector tabs after 2 seconds

optionsAdvancedMiscCloseRedirectorTabsDe.message: Closes tabs from: t.co (Twitter), outgoing.prod.mozaws.net (AMO), slack-redir.net (Slack), away.vk.com (VK)

optionsAdvancedMiscReactivateDelay.message: Automatically re-enable Isolation after n seconds (0 = disabled)

optionsAdvancedMiscPageAction.message: Show popup menu icon in the address bar

optionsAdvancedMiscResetStorageButton.message: Wipe local storage and reset it to default

optionsAdvancedMiscResetStorageDescripti.message: This action cannot be undone. All settings will be lost.

optionsAdvancedMiscResetStorageConfirm.message: Are you sure you want to reset all settings? This action cannot be undone.

optionsAdvancedMiscResetStorageSuccess.message: Settings reset successfully. Page will reload.

optionsAdvancedMiscResetStorageFailed.message: Failed to reset settings. Please try again.

optionsAdvancedCookiesTitle.message: Configure cookies to be set on certain domains in Temporary Containers

optionsAdvancedCookiesWarning.message: Setting cookies can make you easier fingerprintable. Especially when they contain user/session-specific data. Avoid setting cookies if you can.

optionsAdvancedCookiesInfoMessage.message: This will call the cookie API and add the cookie to the header (if allowed) during request processing if the request belongs to a Temporary Container and the domain matches the given pattern.

optionsAdvancedCookiesValidationError.message: Domain pattern, name, and URL are required

optionsStatisticsCollectTemporaryContain.message: Collect local statistics for Temporary Containers

optionsStatisticsCollectDeletesHistorySt.message: Collect local statistics for Deletes History containers

optionsDomainPatternDescription.message: Use exact domains (example.com), subdomains (sub.example.com) or wildcards (*.example.com) to match URLs

optionsAdvancedScriptsTitle.message: Configure scripts to execute for certain domains in Temporary Containers

optionsAdvancedScriptsWarning.message: Scripts have full access to the web page and can read sensitive data, modify content, or perform actions on your behalf. ONLY ADD SCRIPTS FROM TRUSTED SOURCES!

optionsAdvancedScriptsWarning2.message: Firefox Sync is limited to 100KB total. Large scripts may prevent preference syncing across devices. Local Storage is limited to 5MB maximum. Exceeding this limit may cause the add-on to malfunction.

optionsAdvancedScriptsCodeDescription.message: Enter the JavaScript code to execute when the domain pattern matches

optionsAdvancedScriptsValidationError.message: Domain pattern and code are required

optionsAdvancedScriptsWarningAccept.message: I understand and want to enable script injection (requires "Access browser activity" permission)

optionsAdvancedScriptsInfoMessage.message: This will call the script API if the tab url being loaded belongs to a Temporary Container and its domain matches the given pattern.

optionsAdvancedDeleteHistoryWarning.message: Every website URL that you visit in a "Deletes History Temporary Container" will get deleted from your entire history. This means if you visited the same website URL in another Container, Temporary Container or in the Default Container before or while visiting it in a "Deletes History Temporary Container" then those visits will get deleted from history too. This is true until Firefox supports a special history for container tabs.

optionsAdvancedDeleteHistoryBugLink.message: The related Firefox bug can be found here

optionsAdvancedDeleteHistoryCareful.message: Be careful. You have been warned. "Deletes History Temporary Containers" tabs have a "-deletes-history" suffix in the container name to remind you.

optionsAdvancedDeleteHistoryWarningAccep.message: I have read the Warning and understand the implications that come with using "Deletes History Temporary Containers". When ticking the checkbox Firefox will ask you for "Access browsing history" permissions.

optionsAdvancedDeleteHistoryInfoMessage.message: You can open "Deletes History Temporary Containers" - also with the keyboard shortcut (default: Alt+P) - after you read The Warning and ticked the checkbox.

optionsAdvancedDeleteHistoryUrlInfo.message: The deletion applies to the full website URL, not only the domain. That means, if you e.g. open a news article on your favorite news site in a "Deletes History Temporary Container" it won't delete all your previous visits to other news articles that you made outside of "Deletes History Temporary Containers" because the full website URLs are different.

optionsAdvancedDeleteHistoryDeletionInfo.message: "Deletes History Temporary Containers" will delete history when the "Deletes History Temporary Container" itself gets deleted after the last tab in it closes.

optionsAdvancedDeleteHistoryAutomaticMod.message: Don't automatically create "Deletes History Temporary Containers" instead of normal Temporary Containers (default)
Automatically create "Deletes History Temporary Containers" instead of normal Temporary Containers
This affects Automatic Mode, Toolbar Icon and the right-click context menu entry

optionsAdvancedDeleteHistoryContextMenu.message: Show additional "Deletes History Temporary Containers" entry in the right click on links context menu

optionsAdvancedDeleteHistoryContextMenuB.message: Show additional "Deletes History Temporary Containers" entry in the right click on bookmarks context menu

optionsAdvancedDeleteHistoryContainerRem.message: Delete no longer needed "Deletes History Temporary Containers"
15 minutes after the last tab in it closes
After the last tab in it closes (default)
"15minutes" lets you "Undo Close Tab" in that timeframe

optionsAdvancedDeleteHistoryAlwaysPerDom.message: Open new "Deletes History Temporary Containers" for Domains configured "Isolation Always" instead of normal Temporary Containers

optionsAdvancedDeleteHistoryContainerIso.message: Open new "Deletes History Temporary Containers" when "Navigating in tabs Isolation" takes place instead of normal Temporary Containers

optionsAdvancedDeleteHistoryMouseClicks.message: Isolation - Mouse clicks in "Deletes History Temporary Containers"

optionsAdvancedDeleteHistoryMouseClicksA.message: Open new "Deletes History Temporary Containers" with Mouse clicks on links in "Deletes History Temporary Containers" instead of normal Temporary Containers

optionsAdvancedDeleteHistoryMiddleClick.message: Isolation - Middle Mouse Click in Temporary Containers

optionsAdvancedDeleteHistoryMiddleClickD.message: Open new "Deletes History Temporary Containers" with Middle Mouse clicks instead of Temporary Containers

optionsAdvancedDeleteHistoryCtrlLeftClic.message: Isolation - Ctrl/Cmd+Left Mouse Click in Temporary Containers
Open new "Deletes History Temporary Containers" with Ctrl/Cmd+Left Mouse clicks instead of Temporary Containers

optionsAdvancedDeleteHistoryLeftClick.message: Isolation - Left Mouse Click in Temporary Containers

optionsAdvancedDeleteHistoryLeftClickDel.message: Open new "Deletes History Temporary Containers" with Left Mouse clicks instead of Temporary Containers
